actors.name: Priya
actors.role: Automotive Engineer and Quality Assurance Team Lead
actors.purpose: Priya is focused on integrating an AI-powered computer vision system into the car panel inspection process to improve vehicle finish quality. She must ensure the AI complements the human inspectors' expertise and enhances the overall quality assurance.
actors.appearance: A woman in her mid-30s, of South Asian descent, with shoulder-length black hair, wearing safety goggles, a lab coat, and a confident, focused expression.

actors.name: Carlos
actors.purpose: Carlos, as an experienced inspector, provides insights into the practical aspects of the inspection process and works closely with Priya to adapt the AI system in a way that supports the inspectors' workflow.
actors.appearance: A man in his early 50s, Hispanic, with short grey hair, wearing a work uniform with the Autoline logo, a magnifying headband, and a look of curiosity and experience.

visual_style: A vibrant, semi-realistic digital illustration in a modern vector art style, with soft gradients, clean lines, and cinematic lighting.
